item.title: Hundreds of Classic ‘Sesame Street’ Episodes to Hit YouTube With Sesame Workshop Deal (Exclusive)
item.description: Sesame Workshop will also continue to produce some original content for YouTube, and host workshops with creators to help them create entertaining and educational content.

item.description: Sesame Workshop will also continue to produce some original content for YouTube, and host workshops with creators to help them create entertaining and educational content.

item.title: Netflix Sets Premiere Dates for ‘Sesame Street,’ New Season of ‘Ms. Rachel’
item.description: The streaming giant also announced a slate of kids video games based on IP from Dr. Seuss and ‘Paw Patrol.’

item.title: Sesame Workshop Says Elmo’s X Account Has Been “Secured” After Hack
item.description: The official Elmo X account posted bizarre and offensive comments over the weekend.
